Hi folks, I just joined this group.=A0 I was recently at the Lizzy Borden h=
ouse in Massachusetts with Chris Moon and had a session with Frank's Box.=
=A0 The results were astounding.=A0 Is this the newest schematic for Frank'=
s box?=A0 If so, is there a way to get a clearer copy of it?=A0 My son said=
 he would build one for me and I have been searching for the schematic.=A0 =
Can anyone help? - Elaine




________________________________
From: Frank =
Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; grassharp=
@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:45:16 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] Different chip config. [1 Attachment]


[Attachment(s) from Frank Sumptio=
n included below] 


=A0I think I followed an erroneous LM3820 layout, so I=
'm going to breadboard this layout. Note the antenna input is now on pin 12=
-11, this is the RF amp input, and pin 13 is the RF amp output, which feeds=
 pin 1.

=A0'case anyone cares. 

=A0F-S
